examples: She cut her finger on a piece of glass.
Se cortó el dedo con un trozo de vidrio.
He cut himself (= his face) shaving.
She suffered from mental health issues and started cutting herself (= deliberately, as a symptom of mental distress).
Sufría de problemas de salud mental y comenzó a cortarse (= deliberadamente, como síntoma de angustia mental).
She had fallen and cut her head open.
Se había caído y se había abierto la cabeza.
